## loadFluentTheme() function

Load a Fluent theme instance derived from a thematic theme

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function loadFluentTheme(theme: Theme): IFluentTheme;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  theme | Theme | the theme |
